description: This file defines a LoyaltyService class responsible for fetching loyalty data via HTTP using the Dio package. It interacts with an API client and processes the response to return a Loyalty model or throw an exception on failure.

classes.name: LoyaltyService
classes.description: A service class that provides methods to interact with the loyalty API endpoint, fetching loyalty points and history.

methods.name: getLoyalty
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves loyalty information from the API endpoint '/loyalty', returning a Loyalty object if successful.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Internal method to extract and format error messages from DioException errors.
